resources.string: Meteo.FVG Oservatorio Regionale Friuli Venezia Giulia
Network is unavailable.\nData will be updated as\nsoon as network goes up
There was an error downloading bitmap.
There was an error downloading text.
Touch an icon to read further details
Tap over an icon to get further details
You can swipe on the screen to go to the next page
Scroll on the buttons bar to access more contents
Touch the map and move the arrow to measure distances
Touch your location point and move it to change the center of the measurement

Data update policy

Observations and forecast data is taken from http://www.meteo.fvg.it.
Data is automatically refreshed by the application so that the displayed information will always be fairly up to date. There is no need for a refresh button to force a data download on user demand.

How it works

Data is refreshed when:
- more than 30 seconds have elapsed since the last download and:
- the network becomes available after being down or the application is brought to the foreground or the device changes its orientation (the application is restarted by Android).
- Note: the radar image is refreshed each time the radar button is pressed .

When the application is stopped, the current data is saved, and it is restored when the application is brought to the foreground again.
As a consequence, the data displayed when the application starts may not be up to date, at least until the network becomes available and the new data downloaded from the http://www.meteo.fvg.it web site.

Source of data

Graphical and textual information is provided by http://www.meteo.fvg.it

Author

Copyright © 2013 Giacomo Strangolino

The Meteo.FVG for Android application has been developed by Giacomo Strangolino.
- http://www.giacomos.it

- Further information and users guide.

The Meteo.FVG for Android application makes use of icons taken from:
- KDE oxygen icons
- findicons.com radar icon (Creative Commons Attribution License);
- http://icons.mysitemyway.com/free-clipart-icons (observations icon) (Royalty Free Stock Icon/Clipart (Id:125439));
- Google Maps API v1

This application has been released under the terms of the LGPLv3 license. A copy of the license is included in the application package. The name of the file is lgpl-3.0.txt.

Disclaimer

Albeit the application has been designed to update forecast and observation data from http://www.meteo.fvg.it each time it is brought to the foreground by the operating system, after a given period of time aimed at limiting bandwidth usage, the author does not guarantee that the displayed data is actually up to date and synchronized with respect to the information published on the http://www.meteo.fvg.it web site.

The correct parsing of the text files obtained from http://www.meteo.fvg.it is not guaranteed.
The geographical position marked in the maps and the consistency of the locality and address displayed on the observations and forecast map with respect to the actual position of the device are not guaranteed to be correct. In particular, they depend on the location provider currently in use, network, wi-fi or GPS. Each one of the three mentioned providers gives more accuracy, in ascending order.

The application is intended for instruction, entertainment and meteorological news reading, taking into account the two disclaimers above. The application is neither purposed to be used in the design of installations, systems, equipments of any kind or products, nor it is addressed to professional use. Especially, the meteorological observations and forecasts must not be deemed reliable when it comes to organizing excursions, trips, explorations, setting up yards or works of any kind. Unusual, severe or unseasonal weather cannot be predicted by this application.
